snippet.title: Alpha Wave HD Trailer
snippet.description:
Intense. Survival. Action! 

A gorgeous, arcade space shooter influenced by all time 80's arcade classics such as AstroSmash, Space Invaders, Asteroids and Galaxian. Quick, fun bursts of action perfectly tailored for a nice 10-15 minute break at about one-third the price of what a decent espresso will cost you!

Available now for Android, Ouya, iPhone, iPad, Amazon Fire TV, Kindle and FirePhone, Windows Phone 8, Barnes & Noble Nook Tablet and BlackBerry Z10/Z30 & PlayBook.

Official Site: http://alphawave.hardlinestudios.ca

Twitter: @HardlineStudios
FaceBook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Hardline-Studios/166920050066518
